column1: Text table 1: Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. Territories and Commonwealths, yearend 2004 and 2005
Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Text table 1. Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. Territories and Commonwealths, yearend 2004 and 2005
Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

*The number of prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year per 100,000 persons in the resident population.  Midyear population estimates were provided by the U.S. Bureau of the Census, International Data Base.
